animeTitle: Xi Xing Ji: Da Yuan Hun Tebie Pian
otherNames: Xixing Ji: Wukong Specials, 西行纪之大猿魂 特别篇, The Westward: Wukong Specials
synopsis: An independent story of Sun Wukong. It tells the adventure of the great demon Wukong, who dominated the demon road in his previous life, and formed a direct bond with the human girl Guozi.
